Cyclone Gabrielle miracle: How a massive sinkhole near Hawke’s Bay coastline saved lives amid flooding destruction https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/cyclone-gabrielle-miracle-how-a-massive-sinkhole-near-hawkes-bay-coastline-saved-lives-amid-flooding-destruction/5CLK3X5INNHQ5EX4DMKRZJQOCQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/cyclone-gabrielle-miracle-how-a-massive-sinkhole-near-hawkes-bay-coastline-saved-lives-amid-flooding-destruction/5CLK3X5INNHQ5EX4DMKRZJQOCQ/ Neil ReidCyclone survival stories continue to come out - including gratitude for a sinkhole. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 00:40:32 +0000 A large sinkhole which occurred in paddocks at Whirinaki, on the outskirts of Napier, has been credited for helping save lives on the morning of Cyclone Gabrielle's flooding on February 14, 2023. New Zealand Herald photograph by Neil Reid
Auckland train chaos to go for weeks with one in three train services cancelled in peak hours https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-train-services-chaos-to-go-for-weeks-with-one-in- Three-train-services-cancelled-in-peak-hours/ E3HH346NXBA4TFOHLBZPOMBIFY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-train-services-chaos-to-go-for-weeks-with-one-in- Three-train-services-cancelled-in-peak-hours/ E3HH346NXBA4TFOHLBZPOMBIFY/ David WilliamsFrom 3pm today, 19 services will be cancelled on the rail network. Mayor Wayne Brown (inset) has asked for a meeting with transport bosses.
